INSERT INTO GALLERY_CONTENTS (GALLERY_CARDS, SEQ, TITLE, FILE_URL, VIDEO_URL, TXT, YN) VALUES (#{gallery_cards, jdbcType=NUMERIC}, GALLERY_CONTENTS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{title, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{file_url, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{video_url, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{txt, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{yn, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select * from view_gallery_cards where seq = #{cardSeq, jdbcType=NUMERIC}

select gallery_contents.*, gallery_cards.category_type, gallery_cards.writer from gallery_contents left outer join gallery_cards on gallery_contents.gallery_cards = gallery_cards.seq where gallery_contents.gallery_cards = #{cardSeq, jdbcType=NUMERIC} and gallery_contents.seq = #{contentSeq, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
select * from view_gallery_cards where writer = ${code, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.update: update gallery_contents set total_count = total_count + 1, day_count = day_count + 1 where seq = #{contentSeq, jdbcType=NUMERIC}

update gallery_cards set
genre_type1 = #{genre_type1, jdbcType=NUMERIC},
genre_type1 = null,
genre_type2 = #{genre_type2, jdbcType=NUMERIC},
genre_type2 = null,
ai = #{ai, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, title = #{title, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, catchphrase = #{catchphrase, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, synopsis = #{synopsis, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, thumbnail_url = #{thumbnail_url, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yn = #{yn, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where seq = #{seq, jdbcType=NUMERIC}

update gallery_contents set title = #{title, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
file_url = #{file_url, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
video_url = #{video_url, jdbcType=VARCHAR},
txt = #{txt, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, yn = #{yn, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where seq = #{seq, jdbcType=NUMERIC} and gallery_cards = #{gallery_cards, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
update gallery_cards set yn = #{value, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where seq = #{cardSeq, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
update gallery_contents set yn = #{value, jdbcType=VARCHAR} where seq = #{cardSeq, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.delete: delete from gallery_cards where seq = #{cardSeq, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
delete from gallery_contents where seq = #{contentSeq, jdbcType=NUMERIC} and gallery_cards = #{cardSeq, jdbcType=NUMERIC}
